content.textInfo: Our new app allows you to access some of your black account benefits quickly and easily. Watch our quick 'How to' video,and then download the App from App store

benefit.title: Travel Insurance
benefit.content: Enjoy Worldwide travel cover for up to 90 days including winter sports for up to 31 days

benefit.title: Mobile Phone Insurance
benefit.content: Protection against loss, theft, damage or breakdown of your mobile phone

benefit.title: Travel Service
benefit.content: Saving you money with discounted holidays, hotels, car hire, parking and more

benefit.title: Cinema Discount
benefit.content: Great cinema prices with your Black account. Up to 40% off at over 250 cinemas nationwide. Any day, any time.

benefit.title: Ticket Booking Service
benefit.content: Enjoy 25% cashback on tickets to the latest concerts and shows

benefit.title: Car Breakdown Cover
benefit.content: With UK & European car breakdown cover, help is just a phone call away.

benefit.title: Home Emergency Service
benefit.content: Relax in the knowledge we'll put you in safe hands and cover your repairs up to Â£750

benefit.title: Airport Lounge Access
benefit.content: Access to over 1,000 executive airport lounges around the world

benefit.title: Preferential Travel Money Rates
benefit.content: Preferential rates on currency delivered to your home at no extra charge.

benefit.title: Concierge Service
benefit.content: Providing 24/7 help in any way they can. Staffed by passionate, experienced specialists in the fields of dining, entertainment and travel.

benefitBlocks.heading: Manage your sign in details
benefitBlocks.blockText: This is where you can change your personal details or password.

benefitBlocks.heading: View your past interactions with your benefits
